pr_title: Cleanup: Remove the look up to member list on client invocation

timeline.message:
Cleanup: Remove the look up to member list on client invocation

In 3.12, invocations were opening connections. To avoid opening
a connection to a non-member, we had a member-list check.
In 4.0, it is not needed anymore since connections will not be opened
by invocations.

Related TargetNotMemberException check is also not needed on retry.

replies.bodyText: We have changed the logic of the invocations. A put can be successfully done if there are any connected connection. This test was using two members and blocking only one.  I made it  one member it to make it throw TargetDisconnectedException
